team_score.description: Final score of the player's team.

vs_score.description: Final score of the opponent team.

date.description: Date the game was played. Format: ddmm. Year is always 2021, reason why it is omitted.

FG.description: Field goals scored / field goals attempted.

2Pts.description: 2-point field goals scored / 2-point field goals attempted.

3Pts.description: 3-point field goals scored / 3-point field goals attempted.

FT.description: Free throws scored / free throws attempted.

+/-.description: Taking into account only the time the player was in the court, difference between the points scored by the player's team and the points scored by the opponent team.

FGS.description: Field goals scored. Sum of 2PtsS and 3PtsS.

FGA.description: Field goals attempted. Sum of 2PtsA and 3PtsA.
